ParagraphTitle:
It is a company that realizes customer satisfaction
based on excellent technology and quality.
Paragraph: Sijeong Co., Ltd. is a research institute company established with technology investment from the Korea Institute of Standards and Science. Based on the invested visual field technology, we are developing not only optical visual field but also image visual field.In the case of artificial intelligence imaging systems, we are trying to commercialize them for the first time in the world, and we also hold a number of related patents

JS02Title:
It is an automatic weather observation equipment that measures visibility with artificial intelligence image analysis technology.
It provides images and visibility together, and anyone can know easy and objective weather information.
You can also dataize corrective information with real images,
By building big data, it can be used as evidence in academic research and accidents.
JS06Title:
The server analyzes the images taken with the high-definition panorama camera to determine the visibility.
It is an artificial intelligence visibility system that can measure accurate visibility and fine dust concentration,
and accurately analyzes visibility using data analysis and artificial intelligence (CNN deep learning approach).
JS08Title: An artificial intelligence based advanced visibility system that can measure runway visibility and dominant visibility on an airfield. Use two 180 ˚ Panorama cameras to measure dominance every minute.
